creator: GamoVation
descriptionHtml:
The Checkers game that you’ve always played is now available online for free! Quick Checkers is a multiplayer game where you can challenge people from all over the world for a nice classic game of Checkers or Draughts. Play Now!

Quick Checkers is an inspiring traditional game that will keep you entertained for hours on end. Thanks to the intuitive touch controls, you’ll able to enjoy Quick Checkers in just a matter of seconds. Play this competitive, multiplayer online board game from anywhere you want and prove that you are the real Checkers Master.

Quick Checkers online has got the following features:

⭐ Play against random people from all over the world in our exciting 1 vs. 1 player mode.
⭐ The game uses the American Checkers/Draughts rules which are followed by millions of players worldwide. The rules state that hitting is mandatory (but not backwards, unless you’re the King). The King can move one square, forward or backward.
⭐ Amazing graphics and great sound effects.
⭐ Earn experience and level up to get access to real world locations. You can play in places like New York, Paris, London, Amsterdam and Rio de Janeiro.
⭐ Dozens of unique checker Skins and Avatars.
⭐ Ability to upload your own photo.
⭐ Online chat system.
⭐ A competitive ranking system to help you compete against people from your country and across the globe.
⭐ Play and unlock achievements in order to receive amazing rewards.

Are you ready to play this online Checkers board game? Download and play it now for free!

=================

Please note:
Many more cool features will be added to Quick Checkers in the coming months. So if you have any suggestions, comments or feedback, please feel free to share them with us so that we can create the best Checkers/Draughts game ever, together!
descriptionShort: Ready to play Checkers against other players worldwide? Play now for free!

title: Quick Checkers - Online Draughts

creator: GamoVation
descriptionHtml:
The game that you’ve always played is now available online for free! Quick Checkers is a multiplayer game where you can challenge people from all over the world for a nice classic game of Checkers or Draughts. Play Now!

Supported rules:

⭐ American Checkers/Draughts (8x8 board)
Played on an 8x8 board. For men (normal stones), capturing involves jumping forward over an adjacent piece belonging to the opponent, so long as the path isn’t blocked. Unlike the men which are only restricted to one forward diagonal move, Kinged stones can move both forward and backward in a diagonal manner. Since there are no "Flying Kings" in American Checkers, Kinged pieces can only move one diagonal space at a time (either forward or backward) during a non-capture move.
⭐ International Checkers (10x10 board)
Played on a 10x10 board. For men (normal stones), capturing involves jumping forward or backward over an adjacent checkers stone belonging to the opponent, so long as the path isn’t blocked. Kinged pieces are allowed to move any distance, both forward and backward, in a diagonal manner, all thanks to the "Flying Kings" rule.
⭐ Brazilian Checkers (8x8 board)
Played on an 8x8 board. For men (normal stones), capturing involves jumping forward or backward over an adjacent checkers stone belonging to the opponent, so long as the path isn’t blocked. Kinged pieces are allowed to move any distance, both forward and backward, in a diagonal manner, all thanks to the "Flying Kings" rule.

Quick Checkers is an inspiring traditional game that will keep you entertained for hours on end. Thanks to the intuitive touch controls, you’ll able to enjoy the game in just a matter of seconds. Play this competitive, multiplayer online board game from anywhere you want and prove that you can outsmart your opponent.

The online game has got the following features:

⭐ Play against random people from all over the world in our exciting 1 vs. 1 player mode.
⭐ Amazing graphics and great sound effects.
⭐ Earn experience and level up to get access to real world locations. You can play in places like New York, Paris, London, Amsterdam and Rio de Janeiro.
⭐ Dozens of unique checker Skins and Avatars.
⭐ Ability to upload your own photo.
⭐ Online chat system.
⭐ A competitive ranking system to help you compete against people from your country and across the globe.
⭐ Play and unlock achievements in order to receive amazing rewards.

Are you ready to play this online Checkers board game? Download and play it now for free!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:

title: Draughts - Online & Offline

container.value:
Dokter van deenweg 162
8025 BM Zwolle
the Netherlands

creator: GamoVation
descriptionHtml:
The Draughts game that you’ve always played is now available online & offline for free! Quick Checkers is a multiplayer game where you can challenge people from all over the world for a nice classic game of Draughts or Checkers. Play Now!

Supported rules:

⭐ American Checkers/Draughts (8x8 board)
⭐ International Checkers (10x10 board)
⭐ Brazilian Checkers (8x8 board)
⭐ Russian Checkers (8x8 board)
⭐ Turkish Checkers (8x8 board)
⭐ Spanish Checkers (8x8 board)

Quick Checkers is an inspiring traditional game that will keep you entertained for hours on end. Thanks to the intuitive touch controls, you’ll able to enjoy Quick Checkers in just a matter of seconds. Play this competitive, multiplayer online & offline board game from anywhere you want and prove that you are the real Checkers Master.

You can also play offline checkers against the computer or friends. The offline game offers 5 different levels of difficulty meant to enable you to improve your skills!

Quick Checkers online has got the following features:

⭐ Play against random people from all over the world in our exciting 1 vs. 1 player mode.
⭐ Play offline against the computer with 5 levels of difficulty.
⭐ Play local multiplayer against your friends.
⭐ Amazing graphics and great sound effects.
⭐ Earn experience and level up to get access to real world locations. You can play draughts in places like New York, Paris, London, Amsterdam and Rio de Janeiro.
⭐ Dozens of unique checker Skins and Avatars.
⭐ Online chat system.
⭐ A competitive ranking system to help you compete against people from your country and across the globe.
⭐ Play draughts and unlock achievements in order to receive amazing rewards.

Are you ready to play this online & offline draughts board game? Download and play it now for free!

=================

Please note:
Many more cool features will be added to Quick Checkers in the coming months. So if you have any suggestions, comments or feedback, please feel free to share them with us so that we can create the best Checkers / Draughts game ever, together!

Terms of Service can be found here: https://www.gamovation.com/legal/tos-qc.pdf
Privacy Policy can be found here: https://www.gamovation.com/legal/privacy-policy.pdf
descriptionShort: Best Online Checkers Game.

appDetails.developerAddress:
Dokter van deenweg 162
8025 BM Zwolle
the Netherlands
appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Today we launched a new version of Quick Checkers. This version has several bug fixes but we have also introduced a new function for mandatory captures. From now on you can enable or disable mandatory captures in the offline mode. In the online mode you can choose American Checkers rules and turn on or off the mandatory capture function. Enjoy this new update! More will come soon.

appDetails.developerAddress:
Dokter van deenweg 162
8025 BM Zwolle
the Netherlands
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Version 1.6.0 has arrived! This version includes a forced draw system. When 5 or less stones are left and a draw request is refused for the second time the system will force a draw! We also added 8 new stones with the following flags: Chille, Armenia, South Africa, Dominican Republic, Lithuania, Uzbekistan, Thailand and Kazachstan! Last but not least: we support now the following checker rules: Italian, Thai and Czech.

More updates coming soon!

appDetails.developerAddress:
Dokter van deenweg 162
8025 BM Zwolle
the Netherlands
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Version 1.6 has arrived! This version includes a forced draw system. When 5 or less stones are left and a draw request is refused for the second time the system will force a draw! We also added 8 new stones with the following flags: Chille, Armenia, South Africa, Dominican Republic, Lithuania, Uzbekistan, Thailand and Kazachstan! Last but not least: we support now the following checker rules: Italian, Thai and Czech.

More updates coming soon!

title: Draughts - Online & Offline

container.value:
Dokter van deenweg 162
8025 BM Zwolle
the Netherlands

creator: GamoVation
descriptionHtml:
The Draughts game that you’ve always played is now available online & offline for free! Quick Checkers is a multiplayer game where you can challenge people from all over the world for a nice classic game of Draughts or Checkers. Play Now!

Supported rules:

⭐ American Checkers/Draughts (8x8 board)
⭐ International Checkers (10x10 board)
⭐ Brazilian Checkers (8x8 board)
⭐ Russian Checkers (8x8 board)
⭐ Turkish Checkers (8x8 board)
⭐ Spanish Checkers (8x8 board)
⭐ Italian Checkers (8x8 board)
⭐ Czech Checkers (8x8 board)
⭐ Thai Checkers (8x8 board)

Quick Checkers is an inspiring traditional game that will keep you entertained for hours on end. Thanks to the intuitive touch controls, you’ll able to enjoy Quick Checkers in just a matter of seconds. Play this competitive, multiplayer online & offline board game from anywhere you want and prove that you are the real Checkers Master.

You can also play offline checkers against the computer or friends. The offline game offers 5 different levels of difficulty meant to enable you to improve your skills!

Quick Checkers online has got the following features:

⭐ Play against random people from all over the world in our exciting 1 vs. 1 player mode.
⭐ Play offline against the computer with 5 levels of difficulty.
⭐ Play local multiplayer against your friends.
⭐ Amazing graphics and great sound effects.
⭐ Earn experience and level up to get access to real world locations. You can play draughts in places like New York, Paris, London, Amsterdam and Rio de Janeiro.
⭐ Dozens of unique checker Skins and Avatars.
⭐ Online chat system.
⭐ A competitive ranking system to help you compete against people from your country and across the globe.
⭐ Play draughts and unlock achievements in order to receive amazing rewards.

Are you ready to play this online & offline draughts board game? Download and play it now for free!

=================

Please note:
Many more cool features will be added to Quick Checkers in the coming months. So if you have any suggestions, comments or feedback, please feel free to share them with us so that we can create the best Checkers / Draughts game ever, together!

Terms of Service can be found here: https://www.gamovation.com/legal/tos-qc.pdf
Privacy Policy can be found here: https://www.gamovation.com/legal/privacy-policy.pdf

⭐ Czech Checkers (8x8 board)
⭐ Thai Checkers (8x8 board)

Quick Checkers is an inspiring traditional game that will keep you entertained for hours on end. Thanks to the intuitive touch controls, you’ll able to enjoy Quick Checkers in just a matter of seconds. Play this competitive, multiplayer online & offline board game from anywhere you want and prove that you are the real Checkers Master.

You can also play offline checkers against the computer or friends. The offline game offers 5 different levels of difficulty meant to enable you to improve your skills!

Quick Checkers online has got the following features:

⭐ Play against random people from all over the world in our exciting 1 vs. 1 player mode.
⭐ Play offline against the computer with 5 levels of difficulty.
⭐ Play local multiplayer against your friends.
⭐ Amazing graphics and great sound effects.
⭐ Earn experience and level up to get access to real world locations. You can play in places like New York, Paris, London, Amsterdam and Rio de Janeiro.
⭐ Dozens of unique checker Skins and Avatars.
⭐ Online chat system.
⭐ A competitive ranking system to help you compete against people from your country and across the globe.
⭐ Play and unlock achievements in order to receive amazing rewards.

Are you ready to play this online & offline Checkers board game? Download and play it now for free!

=================

Many more cool features will be added to Quick Checkers in the coming months. So if you have any suggestions, comments or feedback, please feel free to share them with us so that we can create the best Checkers/Draughts game ever, together!
